sp.speaker: PHILIP
sp.l: Meet the latest graduate of Kings College!
I probly shouldnt brag, but, dag, I amaze and astonish!
The scholars say I got the same virtuosity and brains as my pops!
The ladies say my brains not where the resemblance stops!
Im only nineteen but my mind is older
Gotta be my own man, like my father, but bolder
I shoulder his legacy with pride
I used to hear him say
That someday
I would

sp.speaker: ENSEMBLE
sp.l: Blow us all away

sp.speaker: PHILIP
sp.l: Ladies, Im lookin for a Mr. George Eacker
Made a speech last week, our Fourth of July speaker
He disparaged my fathers legacy in front of a crowd
I cant have that, Im making my father proud

sp.speaker: MARTHA
sp.l: I saw him just up Broadway a couple of blocks
He was goin to see a play

sp.speaker: PHILIP
sp.l: Well, Ill go visit his box

sp.speaker: DOLLY
sp.l: God, youre a fox

sp.speaker: PHILIP
sp.l: And yall look pretty good in ya frocks
How bout when I get back, we all strip down to our socks?

sp.speaker: DOLLY AND MARTHA
sp.l: Ok!

sp.speaker: COMPANY
sp.l: Blow us all away!

sp.speaker: PHILIP
sp.l: George!

sp.speaker: GEORGE
sp.l: Shh

sp.speaker: PHILIP
sp.l: George!

sp.speaker: GEORGE
sp.l: Shh! Im tryin to watch the show!

sp.speaker: PHILIP
sp.l: Ya shoulda watched your mouth before you
Talked about my father though!

sp.speaker: GEORGE
sp.l: I didnt say anything that wasnt true
Your fathers a scoundrel, and so, it seems, are you

sp.speaker: ENSEMBLE
sp.l: Ooooooooooh!

sp.speaker: PHILIP
sp.l: Its like that?

sp.speaker: GEORGE
sp.l: Yeah, I dont fool around
Im not your little schoolboy friends

sp.speaker: PHILIP
sp.l: See you on the dueling ground
That is, unless you wanna step outside and go now

sp.speaker: GEORGE
sp.l: I know where to find you, piss off
Im watchin this show now
Shh

sp.speaker: PHILIP
sp.l: Pops, if you had only heard the shit he said about you
I doubt you would have let it slide and I was not about to

sp.speaker: HAMILTON
sp.l: Slow down

sp.speaker: PHILIP
sp.l: I came to ask you for advice. This is my very first duel
They dont exactly cover this subject in boarding school

sp.speaker: HAMILTON
sp.l: Did your friends attempt to negotiate a peace?

sp.speaker: PHILIP
sp.l: He refused to apologize, we had to let the peace talks cease

sp.speaker: HAMILTON
sp.l: Where is this happening?

sp.speaker: PHILIP
sp.l: Across the river, in Jersey

sp.speaker: HAMILTON/PHILIP
sp.l: Everything is legal in New Jersey

sp.speaker: HAMILTON
sp.l: Alright. So this is what youre gonna do:
Stand there like a man until Eacker is in front of you
When the time comes, fire your weapon in the air
This will put an end to the whole affair

sp.speaker: PHILIP
sp.l: But what if he decides to shoot? Then Im a goner

sp.speaker: HAMILTON
sp.l: No. He'll follow suit if hes truly a man of honor
To take someones life, that is something you cant shake
Philip, your mother cant take another heartbreak

sp.speaker: PHILIP
sp.l: Father

sp.speaker: HAMILTON
sp.l: Promise me. You dont want this
Young mans blood on your conscience

sp.speaker: PHILIP
sp.l: Okay, I promise

sp.speaker: HAMILTON
sp.l: Come back home when youre done
Take my guns. Be smart. Make me proud, son

sp.speaker: PHILIP
sp.l: My name is Philip
I am a poet
I'm a little nervous, but I cant show it
Im sorry, I'm a Hamilton with pride
You talk about my father, I cannot let it slide
Mister Eacker! How was the rest of your show?

sp.speaker: GEORGE
sp.l: Id rather skip the pleasantries
Lets go
Grab your pistol

sp.speaker: PHILIP
sp.l: Confer with your men
The duel will commence after we count to ten

sp.speaker: ENSEMBLE
sp.l: Count to ten!

sp.speaker: PHILIP
sp.l: Look em in the eye, aim no higher
Summon all the courage you require
Then slowly and clearly aim your gun towards the sky

sp.speaker: MALE ENSEMBLE
sp.l: One two three four

sp.speaker: FULL ENSEMBLE
sp.l: Five six seven
